name: Despair Diviner
description:
Player is a diviner who use cards and magic power to reveal truth for the guests. But there's no supernatural thing happening in this game. That's why player needs to deduct the right answer and make correct option based on the contents of conversation that can provide helpful clues and hints for player.

Simply use mouse click on the answer card to push the conversation. 

The goal is to make higher income that is based on the number of right answer you gave.
